meanings.definition: A person of Latin American descent.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a proud latino from Mexico.
meanings.sent2: Many latinos celebrate their heritage during Hispanic Heritage Month.
meanings.sent3: Why did the latino bring a taco to the party? To spice things up!
meanings.sent4: The vibrant colors of the latino culture paint a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The latino's passion for music is contagious.

meanings.definition: Relating to Latin America or its inhabitants.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant serves delicious latino cuisine.
meanings.sent2: She loves to dance to the lively latino music.
meanings.sent3: The colorful pinata added a fun latino touch to the party.
meanings.sent4: The latino flavors of the dish transported me to a tropical paradise.
meanings.sent5: The latino community is known for its warm hospitality.
